nodes.text: Prtt's Free Pit was a bar and restaurant located within Tunnel 329 inside a mountain on the planet Naalol. The establishment was operated by Aveton Prit, an Imperial informer, and was often used as a place at which individuals could hold discussions and make deals within a neutral, weapons-free setting. During the Galactic Civil War, the bar was a favored haunt of the Imperial Security Bureau operative Nir Rinit.
